name: Merge Dots Pro - Match Number Puzzle Game
name_original: Merge Dots Pro - Match Number Puzzle Game
description:
** Merge Dots Pro **
** More difficult and more challenging **

This is a little fresh puzzle game.
Simple style, simple operation.

You just click on the correct location and place the new dot.
Three or more of the same dots connected to each other will merge into a new dot.

Support the global rankings.
Go ahead and challenge the new record with your friends!
